Title: Range Xor Queries
Description: Given an array of n integers, your task is to process q queries of the form: what is the xor sum of values in range [a,b]?
Input Specification:
The first input line has two integers n and q: the number of values and queries. 
 The second line has n integers x_1,x_2,\dots,x_n: the array values. 
 Finally, there are q lines describing the queries. Each line has two integers a and b: what is the xor sum of values in range [a,b]?
Output Specification: Print the result of each query.
